titles.title: Blessed Be The Name, Blessed Be The Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessed be the Name, blessed be the Name
Blessed be the Name of the Lord
Blessed be the Name, blessed be the Name
Blessed be the Name of the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy is the Name, etc.
Jesus is the Name, etc.
Righteous be the Name, etc.
Power in the Name, etc.
